document_info.title: CYP450 Drug Interactions - Critical Safety Warning
document_info.author: Rev. Ryan Sasha-Shai Van Kush (OnlineAngelicalist)
document_info.purpose: Harm reduction information about dangerous CYP450 interactions with pharmaceuticals
document_info.disclaimer: THIS IS FOR HARM REDUCTION AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY

critical_warning.statement: NO ONE SHOULD TRY mixing Wellbutrin, Abilify, Ephedrine, and Caffeine - it can lead to HEART ATTACKS AND SEIZURES
critical_warning.context: Personal research for working 12-28 hour shifts - NOT RECOMMENDED

inhibition.CYP1A2: Caffeine inhibits CYP1A2, which is the enzyme that primarily metabolizes it
inhibition.CYP3A4: In vitro studies show caffeine can inhibit CYP3A4, but effect not usually seen at typical consumption levels in vivo

induction.CYP1A2: Caffeine is an inducer of CYP1A2, can increase enzyme expression and activity. More pronounced in rats than humans. Typical coffee consumption may not significantly induce CYP1A2 in humans.

caffeine_cyp450_effects.dual_nature: Caffeine both INHIBITS and INDUCES CYP1A2 - context dependent

wellbutrin_bupropion.inhibition_effect: Bupropion is a POTENT INHIBITOR of CYP2D6 activity
wellbutrin_bupropion.cyp2d6_importance: CYP2D6 breaks down about 25% of drugs on the market

strattera_atomoxetine.primary_metabolism: Metabolized primarily through CYP2D6 enzymatic pathway

dangerous_combination_mechanism.what_happens: When mixing Wellbutrin and Strattera, they make each other 5x to 10x STRONGER
dangerous_combination_mechanism.reason: Enzymes are inhibited, so they do not break down what is in the bloodstream and brain

blood_level_buildup.example: If you take time-release Wellbutrin, then take Strattera, your blood levels increase
blood_level_buildup.persistence: Because enzymes don't break it down, substances stay in bloodstream
blood_level_buildup.accumulation: Each additional dose adds to levels that haven't cleared yet
blood_level_buildup.overdose_risk: Much easier to overdose because of accumulation

wellbutrin_seizure_mechanism.key_insight: Wellbutrin danger is about BLOOD CONCENTRATION at any given moment
wellbutrin_seizure_mechanism.not_total_dose: It's not necessarily about how much taken over the day
wellbutrin_seizure_mechanism.critical_factor: How much is in the blood at any given moment determines seizure risk
wellbutrin_seizure_mechanism.cascade_effect: Wellbutrin inhibits CYP2D6, causing OTHER substances to also build up in blood

harm_reduction_principles.blood_levels_matter: Like blood alcohol content - concentration in blood is what matters
harm_reduction_principles.time_release_considerations: Time release formulations complicate dosing when enzymes inhibited
harm_reduction_principles.accumulation_danger: Substances don't clear normally when CYP450 inhibited
harm_reduction_principles.combination_potentiation: Combinations can be 5-10x stronger than expected
harm_reduction_principles.seizure_threshold: Blood concentration getting too high triggers seizures

relevance_to_oilahuasca.same_principles: The same CYP450 principles that make oilahuasca work also make drug combinations dangerous
relevance_to_oilahuasca.prescription_drug_warning: NEVER combine oilahuasca herbs with prescription medications that use CYP450 metabolism
affected_drug_classes: Many others - approximately 80% of drugs use CYP450 metabolism
relevance_to_oilahuasca.critical_rule: If you take ANY prescription medication, consult a pharmacist about CYP450 interactions before using any oilahuasca formulation

cyp450_drug_interactions_warning.author_note: I just wanted to add all of this for Harm Reduction Purposes. The same mechanisms that make oilahuasca potentiation work can be DEADLY when combined with pharmaceutical drugs.

grapefruit_juice_example.key_statement: There are Medications that say 'Do not take with Grapefruit Juice' and it's actually very Serious - this is like the Future of Medicine

mechanism.effect: Medications with low bioavailability due to CYP3A4 breakdown become MORE bioavailable when CYP3A4 is inhibited
mechanism.result: Can cause dangerous overdose-level blood concentrations of medications

connection_to_oilahuasca.statement: This Danger is actually what the Oilahuasca Theory is based on
connection_to_oilahuasca.explanation: The Oilahuasca Theory is about changing how different essential oils or kitchen herbs break down after ingestion, to create psychoactive and sometimes psychedelic effects
connection_to_oilahuasca.emphasis: The point of bringing up all the dangers is: THIS IS VERY REAL

grapefruit_juice_example.future_of_medicine: Understanding CYP450 interactions represents the future of personalized medicine - the same principles used in oilahuasca potentiation are now being studied for drug delivery optimization
